title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4034.3 - Persons excluded from course
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4034.3 - Persons excluded from course

State Regulations

After the horses are ordered to the starting post and
until the stewards direct the gates to be reopened, all persons except the
racing officials shall be excluded from the course to be run
over. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4034.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
